about_the_game:
Due to the one-time nature of traps, there are not many level designs displayed in the promotional video. Please experience the complete level content through the trial version.

Game Introduction

A platform jumping game that guesses players' psychology.

The design of the levels is unconventional, and players must break through common sense to complete them.

You can choose not to play, but you must recommend it to your friends.

Game Features

The game has rich content and a total of 81 levels.

The level design has a certain level of logic, but believing in logic will only lead to the trap of habitual thinking.

Each level has prompts, which are important because the content of the prompts will not deceive people, so please read the prompts carefully.

Warning

This game has a certain level of difficulty in operation, it is recommended to download the trial version and try the difficulty first.

Levels

The game has a total of 81 sub levels, which are divided into 13 major levels based on their characteristics, so each major level contains 6 to 7 sub levels.

Each major level corresponds to a psychological type, which are:

1. Misleading

2. Fear

3. Mistakes

4. Dilemma

5. Impatience

6. Flustered

7. Lose

8. Out of control

9. Cowardly

10. Negligence

11. Temptation

12. Hypocrisy

13. Inertial Thinking

You need to overcome the corresponding psychology in order to be more confident and pass the level easily.

Philosophical level design

Opportunities hidden in danger - Level demonstration:

name: Psychological Challenge

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G5500 / Core i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen3 1200
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750Ti / AMD HD 7790
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires 64 bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win7/Win10
  • Processor: Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen5 1600
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD RX560
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires 64 bit processor and operating system

short_description: An unsettling little game that can increase blood pressure and effectively treat low blood pressure.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese, Traditional Chinese
